name: @theventures/caret
description: Unofficial Node.js API client for the Caret HTTP API

scripts.build: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --format esm --external typescript && bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --format cjs --outfile dist/index.js && bun tsc --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir dist
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun run build && bun test && bun lint

author: TheVentures
